messages.subject: Re: can you help me?
messages.msgSnippet: ... The first question, well, without more info, you ve just described probably between 5-15% of every samurai ever born. For the rest, take a look at
messages.messageBody:
--- In samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com, "samurai_honor13"
<samurai_honor13@...> wrote:
>
> hello everyone. I was wondering if you guys could help me find a
> certain samurai? I remember reading aout him but cannot remember his
> name. From what I remember he was 13 when he first became a samurai
> and he had a form of yoshi in his name somewhere. If you could ell me
> his name or even give me some information on him I would appreciate it
> very much! Also I would like some really good information on the
> Minomoto familly evolving around Yoshitsune Minomoto,as well as
> something about Taira no Shigemori and temoe Gozen. Thank you!
>


The first question, well, without more info, you've just described
probably between 5-15% of every samurai ever born. For the rest, take
a look at www.samurai-archives.com

messages.subject: can you help me?
messages.msgSnippet: hello everyone. I was wondering if you guys could help me find a certain samurai? I remember reading aout him but cannot remember his name. From what I
messages.messageBody:
hello everyone. I was wondering if you guys could help me find a
certain samurai? I remember reading aout him but cannot remember his
name. From what I remember he was 13 when he first became a samurai
and he had a form of yoshi in his name somewhere. If you could ell me
his name or even give me some information on him I would appreciate it
very much! Also I would like some really good information on the
Minomoto familly evolving around Yoshitsune Minomoto,as well as
something about Taira no Shigemori and temoe Gozen. Thank you!
